group_1.textCenter: Is this really the usual counseling room...?!

group_1.textRight: Ohoho... Welcome to the@"Impersonator Magical Girl Investigation Squad"!

group_1.textLeft: It's called DIY! Saechi, did we surprise you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I was so surprised that I raised my voice.

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh, it's such a pleasure to surprise@the ever-smiling Sae!

group_1.textRight: Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Right off the bat, we have an eyewitness,@Himikamin!

group_1.textRight: All right, start the music!

group_1.textLeft: Alrighty!

group_1.textRight: Uh, what...?

group_1.textLeft: It's important to set the mood!

group_1.narration: I was on my way home from school,@as usual, when I spotted Sae...
There's a cheap supermarket in Daito, so I@thought she might've come for the special sales.@I called out to her, but she just@glanced at me coldly and left...
Even though she would normally greet me@with a smile!

group_1.textLeft: That's definitely not Saechi!
I mean, like, would Saechi even be@interested in sales?
Actually, Sae and I often run into each other@at the supermarket!

group_1.textRight: ...*Giggle* It's for social studies, of course.

group_1.textLeft: Saechi's got a family side, too?!@Aren't her specs too high?!
Ahem... [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:eyeClose_0][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]Well then, Sae, where and what were@you doing yesterday evening?

group_1.textRight: I was out and about, but...@I didn't go to Daito.

group_1.textLeft: In conclusion! The one Himikamin saw@was totally an impostor!

group_1.textRight: ...But we don't know the impostor's@true identity...

group_1.textLeft: Could it be a ghost?!

group_1.textRight: There's no such thing as ghosts...

group_1.textLeft: Myako-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Hinano?!
Look at this!

group_1.textLeft: A photograph...?

group_1.textRight: It's from Ryo...a junior of mine.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, could you be referring to the@photographer of The Midori Report...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's her.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm, what's this?
A pic of Myako-senpai and Saechi?
It's like one of those scandalous celebrity@photos that pop up in tabloids.

group_1.textRight: That's not the point here!
Look at the background.

group_1.textLeft: Wha... There's a Sae in the background, too...!

group_1.textRight: I have an enlarged photo of that Sae, too.

group_1.textLeft: She totally gives off bad vibes!

group_1.textRight: That's it! That expression!@That's the one I saw!

group_1.textLeft: And this shot captured the sunset beautifully.

group_1.textRight: No, aren't you focusing on the wrong detail...?

group_1.textLeft: Regardless, this is irrefutable evidence.
It proves without a doubt that Sae truly has@an impostor.

group_1.textRight: Indeed.

group_1.textLeft: Buuut, in the end, what IS the impostor...?

group_1.textRight: ...A doppelganger or something?
Won't a person soon die if they cross paths@with their doppelganger...?!

group_1.textLeft: That's, like, seriously crazy!
Okay! That settles it! Let's go investigate!
Impersonator Magical Girl Investigation Squad,@roll out! Let's go! Saechi!

group_1.textRight: ...Huuuh?!

group_1.textLeft: Let's start the investigation from Daito, where@Himikamin saw the impostor!
